meaning: Being eternal, She is beyond destruction and decay (kshaya) or growth (prosperity, vriddhi).
commentary: Just like the Sun that does not grow nor shrink the inner being (atma, Kshetrajna) can neither grow nor decay. It is pure illumination. This concept is explained in the second chapter of Bhagavad Gita as-  ajo nityah sāśvato ‘yam purano na hanyate hanyamāne sarire.
